events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I purchased.
The reported issue was identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect item.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the incorrect order delivery.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund promptly?
Thanks for responding. My order number is 123456789, and I’ve attached a photo showing the incorrect product that I received instead of what I ordered.
We have reviewed your photo and order details. We can issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds good to me, thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate the prompt resolution offer.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please expect the amount to reflect on your payment card within a few days.
We are checking in to confirm that your refund was received without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we have not heard back from you, we will close this case. Thank you for allowing us to assist you with your refund.
